artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada II; Publisher: Ebiya Rinnosuke
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension: 13 3/4 × 19 3/16 in. (35 × 48.8 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban diptych)

medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Ichikawa Kakitsu and Sawamura Nōshi in the Kabuki Play "Suibo daigo dōno nozarashi"
